_comments.navigation: This array controls the navigation links in the header. The 'href' must correspond to a valid page route. The 'label' is the display text for the link.
_comments.sections: This array defines the order of sections on the homepage. The names must match keys in the 'sectionComponents' object in 'src/app/page.tsx'. Available sections: 'hero', 'products', 'services', 'testimonials'.
